div.head: 婦人下焦三十六疾
div.div: 36 types of ailments affecting the lower burner in women

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Fu ren xia jiao san shi liu ji

entry.def: 36 types of ailments affecting the lower burner in women

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with fu ren san shi liu ji 婦人三十六疾 , 36 types of women’s ailments. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2: 承澤丸，治婦人下焦三十六疾 , “The ‘pills upholding moisture’ cure 36 types of ailments affecting the lower burner in women ”.
